summary: Last chapter of \"Lanterns of Skyrim\" - Add lanterns in villages
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s16.postimage.org/v5yo6kfhx/copertina.jpg[/img][/center]



* OVERVIEW *
This mod add lanterns in the villages around Skyrim and they lit from 5pm to 8am next day. No BSA file required
Just for eyecandy and maybe helpful to recognize villages during night

* VILLAGES *

- Riverwood
- Karthwasten
- Ivarstead
- Rorikstead
- Shor\'s Stone
- Dragon Bridge
- Dawnstar
- Falkreath
- Morthal
- Winterhold

* INSTALLATION *

Place \"Lanterns Of Skyrim - Villages.esp\" into data path and activate it by the menu launcher (option \"data files\")

* UNINSTALLATION *
Disable the file by the menu launcher and delete it.

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod maybe incompatible with any mods that adds lights in villages too.

* SUGGESTIONS *

Download and install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11336]\"Lanterns of Skyrim - Part 1 - Bridges\"[/url]. It add lanterns at the bridges.
[center][img]http://s14.postimage.org/k80wwds2p/bridge.jpg[/img][/center]

Download and install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12451]\"Lanterns of Skyrim - Part 2 - Around cities\"[/url]. It add lanterns around cities.
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12451-2-1331241492.jpg[/img][/center]


* KNOW ISSUE *
When the lanterns are unlit, candles continue to burn.

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find any bug or glitches.
author: MannyGT

files.name: Lanterns Of Skyrim - Villages 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added a lantern to Riverwood
Moved a lantern at Ivarstead
Reduced source light radius
